Manages database operations related to game data.
drawBall(GraphicsContext, Ball) - Method in class com.example.pingpong.View.GameView
Draws the ball on the canvas.
drawGame(Game) - Method in class com.example.pingpong.View.GameView
Draws the current state of the game including all game elements such as the ball, rackets, and the score.
drawGoal(Player, Game) - Method in class com.example.pingpong.View.GameView
Displays a message when a player scores a goal.
drawInstructions() - Method in class com.example.pingpong.View.GameView
Draws instructional text on the canvas when the game is initially drawn.
drawMiddleLine(GraphicsContext, Game) - Method in class com.example.pingpong.View.GameView
Draws a vertical line down the middle of the canvas to visually divide the play area for each player.
drawTimer(int) - Method in class com.example.pingpong.View.GameView
Draws a countdown timer on the canvas.
drawWin(Player, Game) - Method in class com.example.pingpong.View.GameView
Displays a winning message when a player wins the game.
